title: Data Preparation
text:
Introduction
data_preparation is a sub-project of the BioForest project aimed at data preparation within the project, itself divided in the following steps:

title: Data Preparation
text:
Usage
data_preparation is only linking for the subtasks for now. See:

inventories: https://github.com/Bioforest-project/DataAgr_inventories
species: https://github.com/Bioforest-project/DataAgr_Species
environment: https://github.com/Bioforest-project/environment

title: Data Preparation
text:
Project
data_preparation includes:

Presentaiton of the analyses with associated documentation and figures:

Reproductive analyses in files.qmd
Resulting pages in docs/
Document structure definition in _quarto.yml

Git and GitHub files (.gitignore)
Project documentation (README.qmd , README.md , NEWS.md )


Should we add a license?

title: Data Preparation
text:
Contribution

Should we add a contribution link here instead of a description within each project?

title: Data Preparation
text:
Help
Please preferentially create an issue on GitHub for any questions, bugs or help needed regarding data_preparation: https://github.com/Bioforest-project/data_preparation/issues . You may however reach us by mail with people from the core group (see below).

title: Data Preparation
text:
Core group

Sylvain Schmitt (sylvain.schmitt@cirad.fr)

The whole group consist of participants to the Bioforest project.
